TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BadImageFormatException extends System.Exception
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BadImageFormatException extends System.SystemException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit BadImageFormatException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 当动态链接库 (DLL) 或可执行程序的文件映像无效时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the file image of a dynamic link library (DLL) or an executable program is invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果动态链接库（.dll 文件）或可执行文件（.exe 文件）的文件格式不符合公共语言运行时所需的格式，则会引发此异常。This exception is thrown when the file format of a dynamic link library (.dll file) or an executable (.exe file) doesn't conform to the format that the common language runtime expects. 具体而言，在以下情况下会引发异常：In particular, the exception is thrown under the following conditions: - 早期版本的 .NET Framework 实用工具（如 installutil.exe 或）与使用 .NET Framework 的更高版本开发的程序集一起使用。An earlier version of a .NET Framework utility, such as ILDasm.exe or installutil.exe, is used with an assembly that was developed with a later version of the .NET Framework. 若要解决此异常，请使用与用于开发程序集的 .NET Framework 版本相对应的工具版本。To address this exception, use the version of the tool that corresponds to the version of the .NET Framework that was used to develop the assembly. 这可能需要修改 `Path` 环境变量或为正确的可执行文件提供完全限定的路径。This may require modifying the `Path` environment variable or providing a fully qualified path to the correct executable. - 尝试加载非托管动态链接库或可执行文件（如 Windows 系统 DLL），就像它是 .NET Framework 程序集一样。You are trying to load an unmanaged dynamic link library or executable (such as a Windows system DLL) as if it were a .NET Framework assembly. 下面的示例通过使用 方法来加载 Kernel32.dll。The following example illustrates this by using the method to load Kernel32.dll. [!code-csharp[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/cs/condition1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/vb/condition1.vb#1)] 若要解决此异常，请使用您的开发语言提供的功能访问 DLL 中定义的方法，如 Visual Basic 中的 `Declare` 语句或中C#包含 `extern` 关键字的 特性。To address this exception, access the methods defined in the DLL by using the features provided by your development language, such as the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic or the attribute with the `extern` keyword in C#. - 您尝试在非仅反射上下文中加载引用程序集。You are trying to load a reference assembly in a context other than the reflection-only context. 可以通过以下两种方式之一解决此问题：You can address this issue in either of two ways: - 可以加载实现程序集，而不是引用程序集。You can load the implementation assembly rather than the reference assembly. - 可以通过调用 方法，在仅反射上下文中加载引用程序集。You can load the reference assembly in the reflection-only context by calling the method. - DLL 或可执行文件作为64位程序集加载，但包含32位功能或资源。A DLL or executable is loaded as a 64-bit assembly, but it contains 32-bit features or resources. 例如，它依赖于 COM 互操作或在32位动态链接库中调用方法。For example, it relies on COM interop or calls methods in a 32-bit dynamic link library. 若要解决此异常，请将项目的 "**平台目标**" 属性设置为 x86 （而不是 X64 或 AnyCPU）并重新编译。To address this exception, set the project's **Platform target** property to x86 (instead of x64 or AnyCPU) and recompile. - 应用程序的组件是使用 .NET Framework 的不同版本创建的。Your application's components were created using different versions of the .NET Framework. 通常情况下，如果使用 [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] 开发的应用程序或组件尝试加载使用 [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] 或更高版本开发的程序集，或者使用 [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 开发的应用程序尝试加载使用 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本开发的程序集，则会发生此异常。Typically, this exception occurs when an application or component that was developed using the [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] tries to load an assembly that was developed using the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] or later, or when an application that was developed using the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] tries to load an assembly that was developed using the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later. 可能被报告为编译时错误，或者在运行时可能会引发异常。The may be reported as a compile-time error, or the exception may be thrown at run time. 下面的示例定义一个 `StringLib` 类，该类具有单个成员、`ToProperCase`并驻留在名为 StringLib 的程序集中。The following example defines a `StringLib` class that has a single member, `ToProperCase`, and that resides in an assembly named StringLib.dll. [!code-csharp[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/cs/stringlib.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/vb/stringlib.vb#2)] 下面的示例使用反射加载名为 StringLib 的程序集。The following example uses reflection to load an assembly named StringLib.dll. 如果使用 [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] 编译器编译源代码，则 方法将引发 。If the source code is compiled with a [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] compiler, a is thrown by the method. [!code-csharp[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/cs/loadstringlib.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/vb/loadstringlib.vb#3)] 若要解决此异常，请确保其代码正在执行并引发异常的程序集，以及要加载 .NET Framework 目标兼容版本的程序集。To address this exception, make sure that the assembly whose code is executing and that throws the exception, and the assembly to be loaded both target compatible versions of the .NET Framework. - 应用程序的组件面向不同的平台。The components of your application target different platforms. 例如，你要尝试在 x86 应用程序中加载 ARM 程序集。For example, you are trying to load ARM assemblies in an x86 application. 您可以使用以下命令行实用程序来确定单个 .NET Framework 程序集的目标平台。You can use the following command-line utility to determine the target platforms of individual .NET Framework assemblies. 文件列表应在命令行中以空格分隔的列表形式提供。The list of files should be provided as a space-delimited list at the command line. [!code-csharp[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/cs/targetplatform1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/vb/targetplatform1.vb#4)] - 对 C++ 可执行文件进行反射可能会引发此异常。Reflecting on C++ executable files may throw this exception. 这极有可能是因为 C++ 编译器从可执行文件中剥离重定位地址或 .Reloc 节引起的。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the .Reloc section from the executable file. 若要在C++可执行文件中保留重定位地址，请在链接时指定/fixed： no。To preserve the .relocation address in a C++ executable file, specify /fixed:no when linking. 使用值为0x8007000B 的 HRESULT COR_E_BADIMAGEFORMAT。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_BADIMAGEFORMAT, which has the value 0x8007000B. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors.

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将新实例的 属性初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息，如 "可执行文件或库的格式无效"。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Format of the executable or library is invalid." 此消息会考虑当前系统区域性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

summary.span: 使用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化期间调用此构造函数以重新构造在流上传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 用于解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 参数不为空引用，则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为前一个异常的直接结果引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性将返回传递给构造函数的同一值；如果 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `null`。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileName As String
public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取导致该异常的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the file that causes this exception.

value.span: 带有无效图像的文件的名称，或一个空引用（如果未向当前实例的构造函数传递任何文件名）。

span.span: The name of the file with the invalid image, or a null reference if no file name was passed to the constructor for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回为当前实例提供的构造函数的文件的名称（如果有）。This property returns the name of the file supplied to the constructor for the current instance, if any. 如果未指定文件名或为空引用（`Nothing` Visual Basic），则此属性返回空引用。If the file name was not specified or is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), this property returns a null reference. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only.

span.span: Gets the log file that describes why an assembly load failed.

value.span: 一个 ，包含由程序集缓存报告的错误。

span.span: A containing errors reported by the assembly cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取错误消息和引发此异常的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

value.span: 包含错误消息和引发此异常的文件名称的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有为当前异常的构造函数提供消息，此属性将返回系统提供的错误消息。If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message. 如果 属性不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中`Nothing`），则该消息将包括文件名。If the property is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the message includes the file name. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回该异常的完全限定名，还可能返回错误消息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含该异常的完全限定名，还可能包含错误信息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: A string containing the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串表示形式包括异常的名称、 属性的值、对内部异常调用 `ToString` 的结果、 属性的值以及调用 的结果。The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the property, the result of calling `ToString` on the inner exception, the value of the property, and the result of calling . 如果这些成员中有任何一个为空引用（`Nothing` Visual Basic），则它的值不会包含在返回的字符串中。If any of these members is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), its value is not included in the returned string.
